paragraphs.text: Smoke and Shadow is a trilogy of comic books set in the Avatar universe, following on from the events of The Rift. Like its predecessors, Smoke and Shadow is written by award-winning comic author Gene Luen Yang, illustrated by Gurihiru, and published by Dark Horse Comics. The first book was released on October 6, 2015, the second followed on December 29, and the third and last was released on April 12, 2016. The release dates of the first and second comics were changed, as the first book was originally destined to be released on September 23, 2015, and the second on December 16. The hardcover edition was released on October 4, 2016.
